Package ga.genes

Class Summary
DownForceGene Apply a force upwards on an Agent.
FireMissileAheadGene Create and fire a missile Entity on the current heading of the parent Agent.
HealGene Convert some of the parent agents energy into life.
LeftForceGene Apply a force left on the parent agent.
RightForceGene Apply a force right on the parent agent.
UpForceGene Apply a force upwards on the parent agent.
VoidGene A gene that does nothing apart from take up space.
VoidInhibitorGene Always inhibit the next gene along.
VoidPromoterGene Always promote the expression of the next gene.
